description: Creates a new server or updates an existing server. The update action will overwrite the existing server.

parameters.description: The required parameters for creating or updating a server.

location.description: The location the resource resides in.

tags.description: Application-specific metadata in the form of key-value pairs.

subscription_id.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.

api_version.description: The API version to use for the request.

sku.description: The SKU (pricing tier) of the server.
